Sony pravi, da bo PS5 najhitrejša konzola na svetu – hitrejša od konzole Xbox Scarlett

01 Nov 2019, 20:27

Sony PS5 bo najhitrejša konzola na svetu, če gre verjeti oglasu za novo delovno mesto, ki ga je pred kratkim objavil Sony. Novi oglas za delovno mesto Senior Cloud Engineering Manager v korporaciji Sony Interactive Entertainment, je vsem potencialnim kandidatom in tudi širši javnosti podal zelo ambiciozno sporočilo, ki je in brez dvoma še bo dvignil kar nekaj prahu. Gre v bistvu za zelo pogumno izjavo Sonyja, predvsem glede na trenutno stanje, ki vlada na trgu konzol na splošno.
Xbox One X je v tem trenutku okronana kot najbolj zmogljiva konzola, saj ponuja resnično velike procesne moči. Konzola PS4 Pro ji tako sledi na drugem mestu in tega se Sony dobro zaveda. Želi si spremeniti vrstni red na vrhu trga konzol in s tem seveda ponovno prevzeti prvo mesto.
V opisu delovnega mesta lahko najdemo, da bo kandidat pomagala pri »gradnji nove generacije oblačne infrastrukture« in bo eden od vodij elitne ekipe, ki bo v letu 2020 izdala najhitrejšo konzolo na svetu. Brez zadržkov so pri Sonyju oglas objavili in s tem podali jasno sporočilo ne samo zunanji javnosti, temveč tudi internim ekipam, ki delajo na projektu in skrbijo za razvoj nove konzole.

Napeta tekma do cilja

Glede na to, da bi naj obe konzoli, tako Xbox Scarlett in PS5 izšli ob koncu naslednjega leta, je vprašanje zmogljivosti in hitrosti še kako pomembno. To bo po vsej verjetnosti na koncu tudi odločalo o tem, katero si bodo izbrali tisti kupci, ki niso navezani na nobeno od znamk. O tem, kaj so prednosti hitrejših konzol, verjetno ni potrebno izgubljati preveč besed kajne? Hitrejše konzole nam omogočajo hitrejša nalaganja, zmanjšajo zamike v večigralskih načinih in v celoti poskrbijo za kvalitetnejšo uporabniško izkušnjo. Ne glede na to, ali igramo masivne »open-world« igre, kot je recimo Cyberpunk 2077, ali »fast-paced« spletne streljačine, kot je recimo Call of Duty: Modern Warfare, uporabniška izkušnja pri vseh postaja vse pomembnejši faktor pri nakupnih odločitvah.
Hitrost obeh konzol nove generacije bo brez dvoma velik preskok iz tega, kar smo igralci navajeni danes. Majhne spremembe v hitrosti niti niso toliko pomembne, ko govorimo o povprečnih uporabnikih konzol, temveč gre za večje razlike predvsem v primerih, kjer igralci razmišljajo tudi o uporabi VR naprav ipd. – Sony je ravno na tem področju že veliko naredil, pričakujemo pa še dodatne novosti.
Če bo Sonyju dejansko uspelo narediti najhitrejšo konzolo na svetu, bo to pomenilo, da bo Xbox izgubil edino konkurenčno prednost, s katero se lahko trenutno pohvali na trgu »gaming« naprav.
Povezave: TechRadar

Sony says the PS5 will be the fastest console in the world - faster than the Xbox Scarlett

01 Nov 2019, 19:27

The Sony PS5 will be the fastest console in the world, if you believe the ad for a new post recently published by Sony. A new advertisement for the Senior Cloud Engineering Manager post at Sony Interactive Entertainment has delivered a very ambitious message to all potential candidates, as well as the general public, which is and will no doubt raise quite a bit of dust. This is essentially a very bold statement from Sony, especially given the current state of affairs in the console market in general.
At the moment, the Xbox One X is crowned as the most powerful console, offering truly high processing power. The PS4 Pro console is second to none, and Sony is well aware of that. He wants to change the order at the top of the console market and, of course, regain the top spot.
The job description shows that the candidate will help "build a new generation of cloud infrastructure" and will be one of the leaders of the elite team to release the world's fastest console in 2020. Without hesitation, Sony advertised the announcement, delivering a clear message not only to the outside public but also to internal teams working on the project and looking after the development of the new console.

Tense race to the finish line

Given that both consoles, both the Xbox Scarlett and the PS5, are due out next year, the issue of performance and speed is all the more important. This will in all likelihood ultimately be decided by those buyers who are not attached to any of the brands. What are the benefits of faster consoles, you probably don't have to waste too many words right? Faster consoles allow us to load faster, reduce delays in multiplayer modes, and fully deliver a better user experience. Whether we're playing massive open-world games like say Cyberpunk 2077 or fast-paced web-based shooters like Call of Duty: Modern Warfare, customer experience is becoming an increasingly important consideration in buying decisions.
The speed of both new generation consoles will no doubt be a big leap from what we are used to today. The small changes in speed are not so important when it comes to average console users, but there are bigger differences, especially in cases where players are also considering using VR devices and the like. - Sony has already done a lot in this area, and more updates are expected.
If Sony can actually make it the fastest console in the world, it will mean that the Xbox will lose the only competitive advantage it currently boasts in the gaming market.
